headline: Sherwin-Williams Extends 47-Year Dividend Streak As Valuation Questions Linger
summary: Sherwin-Williams (NYSE:SHW) announced its 47th consecutive annual dividend increase. The move extends a dividend streak that now spans nearly five decades. The announcement underscores the company’s ongoing focus on returning cash to shareholders. Sherwin-Williams, trading at $362.59, has built a long record of dividend growth that income focused investors often watch closely. The stock shows a return of 10.6% year to date and 62.7% over 3 years, which indicates how NYSE:SHW has rewarded...

headline: A Look At Sherwin-Williams (SHW) Valuation After Q4 Earnings Beat And Expansion Plans
summary: Sherwin-Williams (SHW) has been back in focus after its Q4 2025 earnings topped Wall Street forecasts on revenue and adjusted EPS, alongside plans for 80 to 100 new stores in 2026. See our latest analysis for Sherwin-Williams. That earnings beat and store expansion plan arrived on top of a 6.18% 90 day share price return and a 10.60% year to date share price return. The 3 year total shareholder return of 62.71% points to momentum that has been building over a longer stretch. If...
